page.title: 01 MILL ANTIQUES
page.content: OUR SQUARES HAVE TWO LARGE VILLAGES, {WASHINGBOROUGH,HEIGHINGTON}AND A SMALL HAMLET ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE RIVER WITHAM CALLED{GREETWELL. }THE COUNTRYSIDE IS DOMINATED BY THE BEAUTIFUL AND MAGNIFICENT {LINCOLN {CATHEDRAL}STANDING HIGH ON THE HILLSIDE IN THE CITY OF {LINCOLN.}THE MAIN INDUSTRY IN OUR DOMESDAY AREA IS ARABLE FARMING. MOST OF THE PEOPLE THAT LIVE IN WASHINGBOROUGH AND HEIGHINGTON COMMUTE TO THEIR JOBS INTO { LINCOLN.}WE LIVE IN A VERY FLAT PART OF THE COUNTRY CALLED THE FENS, IN SOME PARTS THE LAND IS AT SEA LEVEL AND HAS BEEN KNOWN TO FLOOD AT TIMES.THE TWO RAILWAY STATIONS ARE NOT IN USE ANY MORE.ON THE WEST SIDE OF WASHINGBOROUGH IS THE {CANWICK {TERMINAL PUMPING STATION }(SEWAGE) SERVING LINCOLN {76,000}PERSONS. { .
